## About (English)

CD na Escola (Data Science at School) is an educational project that brings statistical thinking and data science to school students in an accessible, contextualized way - inspired by Florence Nightingale's pioneering use of data visualization to communicate evidence and drive change.

As a FAPEMIG scholarship holder, I work on developing an educational platform built with Quarto and producing data and technology content adapted for the school context.
